Nov 3 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN MADAGASCAR *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN MADAGASCAR *AIRTEL AFRICA - GROSS CONSIDERATION FOR TRANSACTION WILL BE $51.7M *AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION WILL BE USED TO REDUCE GROUP EXTERNAL DEBT AND TO INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE IN MADAGASCAR.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 03-NOV-202107:18:03.687 GMT
